name: Human Gesture Recognition with MS Kinect
tagline: Human body gesture recognition with Kinect using SSS features
body:
Implemented the gesture recognition with Kinect using SSS features algorithm explained in 
the paper: http://cs.adelaide.edu.au/~qsheng/papers/p23-zhao.pdf
 
A sample video showing result of the trained gesture recognition can be found at: 
https://www.dropbox.com/s/jf4zfwk3o26geyv/handsup_duck_wave_3each_100lambda_5nclust.mp4?dl=0
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
